name: Carlos André Sabino
description: Senior Full-Stack Developer and CTO with extensive experience in high-availability systems. Specialist in Java and the React/Next.js ecosystem, I currently lead the development of the DocSend accounting ERP and management systems for the aesthetics sector (Aurora's Aesthetic). With a 15-year background in Support, Operations and VoIP/SaaS solutions, I have a 360° view of technology, from code to cloud infrastructure. Proven experience in software architecture, project leadership and creative problem-solving with a focus on scalability.
